Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2018 09:24AM 33megpre wrote: Hi there. I'm sorry you're so frustrated. I too am playing the waiting game with results. Had 2 biopsies done on Monday and they told me it would be a week for results. I have suspicious calcifications that appear to be linear in formation (not good). I just keep telling myself that getting myself worked up and stressing will do nothing to change the outcome at this point. Hang in there, I too will be on pins and needles all weekend!
Posts.Title: Frustrated over waiting kris7 Georgia1
